Class MessageEditor

All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.tree.TreeModel
public class MessageEditor
extends AbstractProlEditor

The class implements the message pane for the IDE because it is a very specialized auxiliary class, it is not described very precisely

Author:
Igor Maznitsa (igor.maznitsa@igormaznitsa.com)
See Also:
